title: Banjinbaliang
synopsis: The film takes two stone lions "Haanjin" and "Baliang" with unique Chinese traditional cultural characteristics as the protagonists. Their images are lively and lovely, one is short and fat, one is tall and thin, one is innocent, passionate, positive and optimistic, and the other is excessive pursuit. Perfect and slightly negative. They just graduated from Stone Lion Academy and dream of becoming the greatest guardian lion. They participate in the lion learning program, and various interesting things happen every day when they perform guard tasks in different places. (translated from iqiyi)
